name: Amateur Cat High Five Challenge
description:
Semi-sequel to 2014's Pro Cat Hugger Extreme. A more tightly-focused game of high fiving cats. Now with fist bumps!

Controls

  • Use the arrow keys to move your arm
  • 'X' key to switch arm position
  • 'C' key to change between open hand and fist

TODO

This game isn't quite finished. I plan on adding the following bits and bobs (and maybe one or two more)

  • Low-fives
  • Easy/hard modes
  • Time extends
  • More skin tones for hands
  • Add missing sounds
  • Music

Ping me on Twitter - @Powersaurus if you have any feedback!

Cheers,

ben
